com.mediamiser.api.adapter

Class LocaleAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.xml.bind.annotation.adapters.XmlAdapter<String,Locale>
      • com.mediamiser.api.adapter.LocaleAdapter

  • public class LocaleAdapter
extends XmlAdapter<String,Locale>
    This adapter allows for Locale objects to be marshalled/unmarshalled to and from BCP 47 tags.
    Author:
    Chris Fournier
